articles.title: Special Envoy of Namibian President Arrives
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Namibian President Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Netumbo Nandi－Ndaitwah, deputy prime minister and minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia, arrived here Friday with her party as a special envoy of the Namibian president.

articles.title: Special Envoy of Namibian President Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Special Envoy of Namibian President Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A special envoy of the Namibian president and her party laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Friday before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Government Hosts Reception in Honor of Special Envoy of Namibian President
articles.content:
DPRK Government Hosts Reception in Honor of Special Envoy of Namibian President
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The government of the DPRK hosted a reception in honor of the visiting special envoy of the Namibian president on Friday.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Netumbo Nandi-Ndaitwah, deputy prime minister and minister of International Relations and Cooperation of Namibia, and her party.
					
					 Present there were Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho and officials concerned.
					
					 Ri said in his speech that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il rendered all sorts of assistance and cooperation to the Namibian people, making great efforts to make sure that they emerged victorious in their bloody struggle for national independence.
					
					 He stressed that supreme leader Kim Jong Un is paying deep attention to the development of the friendly and cooperative relations with Namibia provided by the great leaders.
					
					 Hoping that the special envoy's current visit would mark an important occasion in boosting the bilateral relations, he expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					 Netumbo Nandi－Ndaitwah in her speech said that the relations between the DPRK and Namibia have developed favorably under the particular care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and are further developing under the care of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Noting that the DPRK is a friendly and fraternal country which rendered sincere aid to the struggle of Namibia and forged diplomatic relations with it before any country after its independence, she said Namibia would further developing the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries in the future.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Rejects UNSC Press Statement
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Rejects UNSC Press Statement
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Friday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the UNSC pulled up the DPRK over its test-fire of intermediate strategic ballistic rocket:
					The news of Juche Korea's successful test-fire of surface-to-surface medium long-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10 shook the world, demonstrating its powerful defence capability. But, some hostile forces are attempting to pull up the DPRK over its step for bolstering up the self-reliant defence capability.
					
					On June 23, a press statement was made at the UNSC to "denounce" the test-fire, calling for the implementation of "resolution on sanctions".
					
					We totally reject this UNSC press statement, which is devoid of impartiality and a product of double-standard, as an invention of the U.S. chiefly responsible for the escalated tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					The successful test-fire of strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, a normal action pursuant to the DPRK's line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force, was a self-defensive step to reliably defend the security of the country and its people from the U.S. and other hostile forces' constant threat.
					
					However the UN Security Council adopted what is called a press statement and cried out for the implementation of the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK. This is an unreasonable deed of turning black into white.
					
					The "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is a product of high-handedness wantonly violating the sovereignty of an independent state. 
					
					The UN Secretariat, too, has not brought up the legal basis for justifying it.
					
					The U.S. is the very one that threatens the DPRK by force and aggravates the situation intentionally, steadily hurling into south Korea such strategic means as nuclear submarines and strategic bombers.
					
					It is a legitimate self-defensive step for the DPRK to secure the corresponding powerful attack means now that the U.S. is constantly posing threats to the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK.
					
					As already declared by the DPRK, detente and stability on the Korean peninsula cannot be realized by anyone's unilateral efforts.
					
					The U.S. is well advised to recall how the DPRK emerged a nuclear weapons state and has steadily bolstered war deterrence, before criticizing the latter's efforts to increase the military strength, and reflect on its extremely hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					Its sustained strategic mistake and rash deed are now driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the uncontrollable extreme phase.
					
					The DPRK will take in succession the self-defensive countermeasures of its style as long as the U.S. continues resorting to nuclear threat, sanctions and pressure on it.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Official Clarifies Stand of DPRK at Interview with AP Pyongyang Bureau Chief
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Official Clarifies Stand of DPRK at Interview with AP Pyongyang Bureau Chief
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The director general of the Deparment of U.S. Affairs of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK had an interview with the visiting chief of the AP Pyongyang Bureau on Friday on the recent situation on the Korean peninsula and the issue of the DPRK-U.S. relations.
					 Answering questions about the present situation on the peninsula, the director general strongly denounced the U.S. for recently introducing such strategic assets as the nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi and a B-52H strategic bombers formation one after another into south Korea, staging a drill for mounting a preemptive nuclear strike on the DPRK and extremely straining the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The director general referred to the DPRK's principled stand that it is left with no other option but to steadily take steps for bolstering its nuclear deterrence for self-defence including nuclear test and missile launch in order to cope with the ever-increasing threat of aggression from the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 In connection with the test-fire of the surface-to-surface strategic intermediate ballistic rocket Hwasong-10, he said that it is the stand of the DPRK that it should have strong attack means capable of posing constant threat to the enemies in order to firmly protect the security of the country and its people from the threat being constantly posed by the U.S. and other forces hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 Over the issue of improving the relations with the U.S., he recalled that at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea supreme leader Kim Jong Un urged the U.S. to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the armistice agreement with a peace treaty and withdraw its aggressor troops and war hardware from south Korea by correctly understanding the strategic position of the DPRK which has ranked itself among the advanced nuclear weapons states and facing up to the trend of the times.
					
					 The director general clarified the stand of the DPRK to improve and normalize its relations with the countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it although they were in hostile relations with it in the past.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Accuses S. Korean Regime of Passing Buck on Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations to DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Accuses S. Korean Regime of Passing Buck on Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations to DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA Friday in connection with the fact that the south Korean puppet forces recently termed the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons scrapping of inter-Korean agreements:
					 Shortly ago, mandarins of the puppet Ministry of Unification of south Korea in the "document on its stand on the June 15 joint declaration" spouted strange sophism that the DPRK's nuclear weapons are violating the main spirit of the north-south agreements and standing in the way of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative media and the venal "experts on north Korean affairs" are claiming as if dialogue, exchange and cooperation between the north and the south were suspended due to the DPRK's nuclear tests and ballistic rocket launches. 
					
					 This is no more than a cynical ploy of the puppet forces to shift the blame for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations onto the DPRK and justify their policy of confrontation with it and an intolerable mockery of the main spirit of the north-south agreements.
					
					 It was neither the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrence nor its ballistic rockets that scrapped the main spirit of the inter-Korean agreements and drove the north-south relations into the present catastrophe. The Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea was entirely to blame for this situation as it has been hell-bent on acts of treachery with the daydream of isolating and stifling the compatriots in the north in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Nevertheless, the puppet forces are going so impudent as to find fault with the DPRK, raising a hue and cry over "scrapping" and "violation." This is just like a guilty party filing the suit first.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime has lost face or qualifications long ago to talk about the north-south agreements as it is bringing the danger of a nuclear war to hang over the nation after reducing south Korea to the world's biggest nuclear outpost.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group can never evade the responsibility for having totally denied and scrapped the inter-Korean agreements. It will never be able to escape a stern punishment by history and the nation.

articles.title: Australian Ambassador to DPRK Clarifies Stand to Develop Friendly Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Australian Ambassador to DPRK Clarifies Stand to Develop Friendly Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- William Paterson, ambassador of the Commonwealth of Australia to the DPRK, and his party met officials concerned of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK including Choe Hui Chol, director general of the Asian and Oceanian Department, and Ma Tong Hui, director of the Disarmament and Peace Institute, between June 20 to 24, 2016.
					 The DPRK side informed the Australian side in detail of the principled stand of the DPRK government to expand and develop friendly relations with the Commonwealth of Australia in the political, economic, cultural and other fields irrespective of the change of situation in the idea of foreign policy of independence, peace and friendship as well as its stand on the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and the issue of the north-south relations.
					
					 The Australian side informed the DPRK side of its opinion on several issues of regional and mutual concern including the Korean peninsula in a frank and candid manner, and confirmed that it would in the future, too, recognize the DPRK as a sovereign state and not take hostile stand toward it. It also took note of the DPRK side's stand that the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has massive impact on ensuring peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Both sides had an in-depth discussion of ways of developing friendly relations between the DPRK and the Commonwealth of Australia in an amicable atmosphere.
					
					 The ambassador and his party looked round several cooperation projects including gravity-fed drinking water supply project completed in Tongrim County Township, North Phyongan Province with the fund the Australian government provided through international organizations.

articles.title: Greetings to C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
articles.content:
Greetings to C.C., Mozambique Liberation Front Party
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) sent a congratulatory message to the Central Committee of the Mozambique Liberation Front Party (MLFP) on Friday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of its founding.
					 The message said that the WPK is pleased with fact that the MLFP registered a lot of successes in its work for the country's political stability and socio-economic development by leading the government and people of Mozambique over the past 50-odd years.
					
					 It sincerely wished the MLFP bigger success in its activities for strengthening the party and achieving the country's prosperity, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the interests of the two peoples in the future, too.

articles.title: President of International Ice Hockey Federation Arrives
articles.content:
President of International Ice Hockey Federation Arrives
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Rene Fasel, president of the International Ice Hockey Federation, and his companion arrived here on Friday.

articles.title: National House of Class Education Opens
articles.content:
National House of Class Education Opens
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The newly built National House of Class Education was inaugurated on the occasion of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					Covering a total floor space of 3,910 square meters and with 3 200 square meters for display, the house displays more than 1,670 photos, over 100 pieces of art works including semi-panorama, wax replicas and sculptures as well as more than 3,000 pieces of relics and evidence of diverse forms which bear witness to the barbarous, vicious and cruel nature of the U.S. and Japanese imperialists, the south Korean puppet forces and class enemies.
					
					An inaugural ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Kim Su Gil, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, city-level institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army, builders, people of merits and employees of the house.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an inaugural speech.
					
					He said that the house reveals the aggressive nature of the U.S. and Japanese imperialists and class enemies and the monstrous crimes committed by them, adding this place will touch off the towering indignation of the army and people of the DPRK determined to certainly take revenge upon the sworn enemies.
					
					He noted that the visitors to the house will clearly realize who their principal enemies are and what vicious blood-suckers they are standing against and will whet more sharply the weapons of the working class for revenge and harden their resolution to have towering grudge settled.
					
					He stressed the need for the service personnel, youths and other people to have the transparent view on the principal enemies, staunch anti-imperialist and working class awareness and intensify the drive for creating the Mallima speed in the 200-day campaign of loyalty in the spirit of dealing sledge blows at the enemies. 
					
					At the end of the ceremony the attendants went round the house before a briefing.

articles.title: Youth, Students in Pyongyang Meet to Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Imperialist Aggressors
articles.content:
Youth, Students in Pyongyang Meet to Vow to Take Revenge upon U.S. Imperialist Aggressors
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in Pyongyang met at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre on Friday to vow to take revenge upon the U.S. aggressors on the eve of June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Mun Chol, first secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers denounced the U.S. imperialists for stretching a tentacle of aggression and plunder of the DPRK from more than one hundred years ago, igniting a war of aggression to swallow up it in its cradle in the 1950s and reducing the whole Korean territory into ashes and ruthlessly killing millions of Koreans through germ warfare and chemical warfare.
					
					 We will never forget the monstrous atrocities the U.S. imperialists ruthlessly killed the patriots and people wherever they occupied during the strategic temporary retreat of the Korean People's Army during the war, they added.
					
					 They said the young people are faced with the heavy yet honorable task to achieve the historic cause of national reunification, the greatest desire of the nation, at an early date and bring earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution.
					
					 They called for creating lots of heroic legendary stories about youth in all sites for building a socialist power on the principle of giving priority to self-development in the spirit of decisively smashing the ever more undisguised moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.

articles.title: Hundreds of Explosives Discovered Bear Witness to U.S. Imperialists' Monstrous Atrocities
articles.content:
Hundreds of Explosives Discovered Bear Witness to U.S. Imperialists' Monstrous Atrocities
 Hamhung, June 24 (KCNA) -- Many more explosives are being discovered in the DPRK to lay bare the hair-raising atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists during the last Korean war.
					 Hundreds of explosives were discovered one after another in South Hamgyong Province this year.
					
					 250 kg, 100 kg and 50 kg bombs dropped by aircraft of the U.S. forces were discovered in fields at the foot of hillocks, sites for planting trees and under sand of port in Rakwon County, Sudong District, Jangjin County and Sinpho City from the end of April to May this year.
					
					 Hand grenades and dozens of bullets were discovered in plots of dwelling houses in Hochon County and shells and bullets in a vegetable field of the Ryongyon Cooperative Farm in Tanchon City.
					
					 Tens of shells and more than 100 bullets were found in pasture for goats in Raeil District, Hamhung City in June. Discovered in various other places of the province were more pieces of evidence proving the bestial atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists on this land.
					
					 These explosives pose constant threats to the lives and properties of people.

articles.title: Endless Stream of Service Personnel, People Visit Sinchon Museum
articles.content:
Endless Stream of Service Personnel, People Visit Sinchon Museum
 Sinchon, June 24 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of service personnel and people visit the Sinchon Museum which bears witness to the barbarous, vicious and cruel nature of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies in the run-up to June 25, the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 It has been visited up to now since the outset of the year by service personnel of the Korean People's Army, people of various circles and school youth and children of more than 3,100 units including Kim Il sung University, the Ministry of Mining Industry, the Capital City Construction Commission, the Tokchon Area Coal-Mining Complex and Ryusong Junior Secondary School in Central District of Pyongyang.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists occupied Sinchon County in the period of the strategic temporary retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Fatherland Liberation War and massacred more than 35,000 patriots and people or a quarter of the then population of Sinchon County by the most brutal method in less than two months.
					
					 The visitors shook with resentment, looking at the clothes and rubber shoes stained with blood, bundles of hair, various kinds of torture tools and lethal weapons, evidence proving the monstrous atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 They posed for a long while before a semi-panorama showing GIs' hair-raising massacre of 400 mothers and 102 children.
					
					 At the end of the visits they held meetings to vow to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Endless Stream of Service Personnel and People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
articles.content:
Endless Stream of Service Personnel and People Visit Susan-ri House of Class Education
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Thousands of service personnel of the People's Army, people from all walks of life, youths and students are visiting the Susan-ri House of Class Education every day. They are from the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, the Ministry of Railways, the General Bureau of Public Service, the Sangwon Cement Complex, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, etc.
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors intruded into the land of Susan in the period of the temporary strategic retreat of the Korean People's Army during the Korean war and massacred a lot of innocent people, one third of the then population of myon in the most brutal manner.
					
					 A chestnut storehouse where patriots were massacred, a grave of 490 odd patriots, a grudge-bearing stepping stone that had been thrown by Yankees on the dead bodies of all members of a family after hacking them into pieces with axes and knives lash all visitors into great fury.
					
					 The visitors once again kept in mind the truth of history that the brutal nature of the U.S. imperialists and class enemies remains unchanged and illusion about the enemy precisely means death.
					
					 Service personnel of the People's Army, people from all walks of life, youths and students in their speeches at meetings called for wiping the U.S., the empire of evils, off the surface of the earth, hitting out at the massacres committed by the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: National Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Ideas and Lines Held
articles.content:
National Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Ideas and Lines Held
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A national seminar was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday to deeply grasp and thoroughly implement the ideas and lines set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Presented at the seminar were papers which explained and proved the originality and validity of the ideas and lines advanced  in the report to the Seventh Congress of the WPK on the work of the Central Committee made by Kim Jong Un and which indicated the ways of thoroughly carrying out them.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., the WPK, and other speakers said that the revolutionary lines set forth in the report including the clarification that the general line of building socialism and the self-development-first principle serve as the strategic line to be consistently maintained in building a socialist power and realizing the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism are an encyclopedic and political great programme which gives perfect answers to the theoretical and practical issues in the revolution and construction.
					
					 They noted that the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism clarifies the correct orientation and ways of firmly  preparing those in charge of accomplishing the cause of the popular masses for independence, the socialist cause,  and the driving force, enhancing their role, transforming all fabrics of social life as required by Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and triumphantly advancing the revolution and construction.
					
					 They said the general line of building socialism and the self-development-first principle serve as the strategic line for helping firmly provide the powerful driving force for building a socialist power.
					
					 They pointed out that the WPK and the Korean people will straightly advance along the immutable orbit of independence, Songun and socialism and discharge their pioneer role in the struggle to realize global independence as the defenders of independence and justice under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un no matter how the situation may change and relations with neighboring countries may alter.
					
					 They called upon all the party members and other working people to turn out as one in the drive to carry out the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 They also called upon all the officials, party members and other working people to cherish the ideas and lines advanced by Kim Jong Un in his report to the Seventh Congress of the WPK and become victors in the general advance to usher in the greatest heyday for building a socialist power.

articles.title: Anniversary of Labor Law Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Labor Law Marked
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Central Youth Hall Thursday to mark the 70th anniversary of the Labor Law.
					 President Kim Il Sung personally completed the draft labor law in order to provide the Korean people with true working conditions and made sure that all-people discussion was made on the draft labor law. Then he promulgated the Labor Law on June 24, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 Present at the meeting were Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, O Su Yong and Ro Tu Chol, and officials of power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of institutions and enterprises and other working people in the city. 
					
					 Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, made a report.
					
					 He said that the Labor Law which embodied the Juche-oriented idea on the issue of labor clarified by the President is an original labor programme which reflected the requirements for developing the Korean revolution and the aspiration of the people and a democratic law which newly stipulated the issue of the working people's labor. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The promulgation of the historic Labor Law helped the Korean people positively turn out in building a new country as the master of labor and paved a wide avenue to rapidly improving the people's working conditions and the standard of their material and cultural life.
					
					 Kim Il Sung comprehensively dealt with successes and experience gained in the struggle to strengthen the socialist labor system and worked out and promulgated "The Socialist Labor Law of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea", legally consolidating the best socialist labor system of our country.
					
					 Since the promulgation of the labor law, the socialist labor system of our country has fully demonstrated the advantages and might as the most revolutionary and popular labor system under the guidance of the great leader and the great party and brought about a great turn in the people's working life.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to firmly preserve the revolutionary feats Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in developing the socialist labor administration and thoroughly implement their last instructions.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK Labor Law
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK Labor Law
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 70th anniversary of the promulgation of the Labor Law in Korea.
					 On the anniversary the DPRK people look back upon the feats President Kim Il Sung performed to provide them with a worthwhile working life by promulgating the democratic Labor Law after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 Before Korea's liberation, its people were forced to do harsh slave labor by the Japanese imperialist aggressors.
					
					 With deep insight into such situation, Kim Il Sung had worked heart and soul to adopt a new democratic labor law for the working masses as required by the developing social economy of the country.
					
					 He personally worked out a draft labor law and made sure that the draft was presented for popular discussion. Then he promulgated "Labor Law for the Factory and Office Workers in North Korea" on June 24, Juche 35 (1946).
					
					 The promulgation of this Labor Law was a great social change in the country as it provided a legislative system for the people to lead an independent and creative working life.
					
					 Under the law, the working masses in the DPRK came to enjoy their democratic rights to labor and relaxation such as 8-hour working system and paid-leave system for the first time.
					
					 After that Kim Il Sung saw to it that the Socialist Labor Law was enacted to keep with the establishment of the socialist system.
					
					 Today the DPRK people lead a happy life as the masters of the country, enjoying such benefits of the state as free compulsory educational system, free medical care system, social insurance and pension systems as well as system of accommodation at health resorts and holiday homes at the state expense.

articles.title: Precautionary Measures Taken for Rainy Season in DPRK
articles.content:
Precautionary Measures Taken for Rainy Season in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The area south of the central eastern and western coasts will witness heavy rain with rainy season to start in Korea from mid-July, according to a weather forecast.
					 In this regard, measures have been taken to prevent damages in the season.
					
					 Regarding the prevention of damages caused by flood, rainy wind and typhoon as an important work to protect land and do farming well, all units in the DPRK are making necessary measures for the season.
					
					 Power stations and transformer substations, including the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex, have checked up lightening rods for power-generating facilities and electric transmission systems.
					
					 The Kaechon Area Coal-Mining Complex, the Komdok Mining Complex and other collieries and mines are preparing drain pumps and motors for immediate operation.
					
					 It has also been pushed forward to reinforce railroads and railway structures and build or repair revetments in dangerous places.
					
					 In rural areas, such measures are being taken as checkup of pumping stations and culverts and reinforcement of waterways and river embankments.
					
					 Meanwhile, deep attention is paid to supplying drinking water in rainy season.

articles.title: Successes Made in Microsurgery and Plastic Surgery
articles.content:
Successes Made in Microsurgery and Plastic Surgery
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The lab for microsurgery and plastic surgery under Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK has made a number of successes over the last 20-odd years.
					 According to Dr. Jang Myong Guk, head of the lab, it has succeeded in several hundreds of operations for replantation of amputated limbs.
					
					 And, it has successfully carried out over 3,000 microsurgical and plastic surgical operations, including free vascularized bone graft, free vascularized skin flap and lengthening of limbs.
					
					 The lab also developed atraumatic suture for microsurgical operation and completed its production line.
					
					 Jong Phyong Il, 14 years old, said his right arm was completely amputated a year ago, but thanks to the most advantageous socialist healthcare system of the country, he had a free operation for replantation.

articles.title: Two-way Communication Teaching Method
articles.content:
Two-way Communication Teaching Method
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Ju University of Education in the DPRK recently developed a new teaching method based on two-way communication means. It is a superior educational method which makes the content of education practical, comprehensive and up-to-date as required by improved educational condition and environment.
					 According to the method, a network in multi-functional classroom provides teachers and students with the environment for questioning and answering, thus making it possible to estimates the digestion of students in real-time.
					
					 The method has been applied to universities across the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Protect Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Protect Peace
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should turn out as one in the nation-wide patriotic struggle to ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula in hearty response to the appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 If the Koreans fail to ensure peace and security on the peninsula, they can neither survive nor achieve national reunification, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. keeping its armed forces in south Korea has posed a grave threat to the peace and security on the peninsula while pursuing the policy of aggression against the DPRK, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 It is impossible to ensure peace on this land and achieve the reunification desired by all Koreans without the struggle against aggression and war moves.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should unconditionally stop all war drills against the north putting peace and security on the peninsula at peril.
					
					 The Koreans should not remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers' reckless acts of bringing disasters to the Korean nation, persisting in their dangerous military provocations against the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Only when all the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad are turning out as one in the nation-wide struggle to foil the domestic and foreign bellicose forces' moves to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK in hearty response to the appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations, is it possible to ensure peace and security on the peninsula and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists, S. Korean Warmongers Kick off Drill for Preemptive Attack upon DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists, S. Korean Warmongers Kick off Drill for Preemptive Attack upon DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea and the puppet warmongers have made desperate efforts to stage a drill for a preemptive attack upon the DPRK at the firing range in Yangphyong, Kyonggi Province, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The Second Division of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces, helicopters and tanks of the First Air Force Brigade and the Third Armored Brigade of the puppet army and other massive offensive means were involved.
					
					 They staged powder-reeking exercises aimed to make a preemptive attack upon the far-off base of the opposite side with the use of helicopters and make a full-scale attack with motorized troops on the eve of the start of attack.

articles.title: Anti-"government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea in Demand of Damages Caused by Shutdown of KIZ
articles.content:
Anti-"government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea in Demand of Damages Caused by Shutdown of KIZ
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean emergency measure committee composed of representatives of the businesses involved in the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) held a meeting in Seoul on June 22 to declare a struggle in demand of the authorities' payment of damages caused by the shutdown of the KIZ, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The organization said it decided not to accept the "government's" deceptive measure for compensating the losses suffered by the businesses in the KIZ and decided to start the anti-"government" action as a follow-up measure.
					
					 The organization declared it would hold a rally and demo against the "government's" misrule and conduct positive activities to let public at home and abroad know about the losses suffered by the businesses in the KIZ.

articles.title: S. Korean Opposition Parties Disapprove "State-compiled History Textbooks"
articles.content:
S. Korean Opposition Parties Disapprove "State-compiled History Textbooks"
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Opposition party lawmakers in south Korea submitted a bill on prohibiting the "state-compiled history textbooks", according to the south Korean KBS on June 19.
					 They came out with the bill on revising the law of primary and secondary education by deleting the existing article which stipulated the use of the "state-compiled history textbooks" at secondary and high schools.
					
					 The opposition parties will make all efforts to prevent the Park Geun Hye regime from pushing ahead with the system of introducing the "state-compiled history textbooks", they noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Russian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Russian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Za Narodnuyu Blastsi on June 16 dedicated four whole pages to "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on the work of the Central Committee on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 It carried a photo of Kim Jong Un speaking at the Seventh Congress of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Polish Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Polish Body
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" on its website on June 17.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble career characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates the important matters arising in embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Finland, Sweden, South Africa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Personages of Finland, Sweden, South Africa
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Lectures were given in Finland, Sweden and South Africa on June 17 and 18 on the occasions of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 Kalevi Wahrman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, said Kim Jong Il had done everything that he could do for the development of the party, the accomplishment of the socialist cause in Korea and the reunification of Korea to the last moments of his life since he started his work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party in Sweden noted it was thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il that the WPK could victoriously advance the socialist cause, enjoying the full support and trust from the Korean people.
					
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, were adopted, heralding the era of By the Korean Nation Itself, the new era of independent reunification-this was his distinguished feat in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il is always alive as a peerless patriot, enjoying the boundless reverence from the Korean nation and progressive humankind as he protected the destiny of the country and nation with his outstanding Songun politics and brought an epochal turn in Korea's reunification.
					
					 Korean films "Kimjongilia", "Sci-Tech Complex" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp" were shown at the lectures.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried articles on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 An article titled "Undying feats HE Kim Jong Il performed in building and leading party" on Nigerian Observer on June 15 said that Kim Jong Il set forth it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, its founder, in name and reality in the whole course of his leadership over it and successfully carried out the task.
					
					 It noted he built the WPK into the party which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses and faithfully served the people.
					
					 It said that he turned the WPK into a powerful political force successfully guiding the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 It pointed out that his party-building exploits will be handed down together with ever-victorious socialist Korea.
					
					 The June 17th issue of the Egyptian newspaper Al Akhbar Almassay said in an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il and the WPK" that he devoted his all to the development of the WPK, prosperity of the country, happiness of the people and the victory of the socialist cause, making tremendous contributions.
					
					 Kuwait Times on June 15 in an article entitled "Undying party-building exploits" praised him for building the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions in which the monolithic ideological system and leadership system of the leader have been thoroughly established.
					
					 The article praised him for turning the WPK into a mother party which takes care of the people in a responsible manner, a powerful guiding force in the Korean society and an invincible party.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Personages of Kuwait, Angola
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Personages of Kuwait, Angola
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Personages of Kuwait and Angola made public statements on June 16 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwaiti Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, said that not only the Korean people but also the world progressives impressively recollect the party-building exploits of leader Kim Jong Il in boundless reverence for him on June 19 every year.
					
					 He noted that Kim Jong Il developed the great Juche idea as the guiding idea of the WPK and pursued invincible Songun politics to decisively smash the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The director of the social education department of the Committee of Angola for Friendship and Solidarity with Peoples said that the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung is the most powerful and militant revolutionary party which successfully achieved the organizational and ideological unity and cohesion, bravely meeting all kinds of challenges and overcoming ordeals of history under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The exploits leader Kim Jong Il performed for building the party will shine forever with ever-victorious socialist Korea.
					 This is part of an article titled "Kim Jong Il, his undying party-building exploits" posted by the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions on its website.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set forth it as the most important task to develop the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung, its founder, in name and reality in the whole course of his leadership over it and successfully carried the task out.
					
					 The solid unity and cohesion of the WPK around the President was achieved thanks to HE Kim Jong Il's transparent outlook on the leader, matchless insight, principled and resolute political decision and seasoned leadership ability.
					
					 He built the WPK into the party which formed a harmonious whole with the popular masses, took care of their destiny in a responsible manner and faithfully served them.
					
					 The WPK further consolidated the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses despite the political upheavals in the world thanks to the leadership of him who pursued the benevolent politics characterized by loving care and trust.
					
					 He developed the WPK into a powerful political force successfully guiding the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Posted on the website was his photo.

articles.title: Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibitions Held in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Photo, Book and Fine Art Exhibitions Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Korean photo, book and fine art exhibitions were held in Partizansk City and Bikin District of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia from June 15 to 22 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed at the venues of the exhibitions were photos showing the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un, books and photos introducing the true picture of the DPRK and art works showcasing the Korean people's wisdom and talents.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremonies were personages of various strata and masses of Russia.
					
					 A vice mayor of Partizansk City said that the exhibition opened to celebrate the meaningful June 19, which was of great significance and that the exhibition would help the Partizansk citizens know better about the DPRK.
					
					 The chief executive of Bikin District said he was pleased with the opening of the exhibition and the photos helped him know better about how energetically Kim Jong Il worked for the country and its people.

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Foreign bodies posted special write-ups on their websites on June 14 to mark the 16th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association posted an article titled "June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is a realistic way of achieving peace and reunification of Korea" illustrated with photos of leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The article recalled that the north-south summit was held in Pyongyang in June, 2000, in which the June 15 joint declaration was adopted to open up a new era of north-south dialogue for achieving the country's reunification by the Korean nation itself. It also referred to the north-south relations that have reached a total deadlock after the emergence of the pro-U.S. conservative regime in south Korea.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea reconfirmed that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are the great programmes common to the nation that should be consistently upheld in settling the issue of Korea's reunification but the south Korean regime is denying it, the article noted.
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany in an article titled "By providing landmark for national reunification" said the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration provided the Korean nation with the great joint programme for reunification and a landmark for independent reunification and helped them usher in a stirring era of independent reunification.
					
					 The historic Pyongyang summit and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration are the greatest exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean nation.
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted an article titled "Spirit of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration is immortal" and articles subtitled "By Korean nation itself", "June 15 era of reunification" and "Immortal banner."

articles.title: Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Anniversary of June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Indonesian and Myanmar newspapers respectively dedicated one whole page to special write-ups marking the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Indonesian newspaper International Daily on June 15 in an article titled "By ushering in new era of independent reunification" illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il said that he dedicated his all to accomplishing the Korean nation's cause of reunification.
					
					 It said he provided a strong political and military force for national reunification and that the era of By Our Nation Itself, the June 15 era of reunification, was ushered in thanks to his Songun leadership.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The hot wind of following Kim Jong Il as the lodestar of reunification was raised among all Koreans in the north and the south and abroad and anti-U.S., pro-reunification sentiments unprecedentedly mounted in south Korea. He is always remembered by the Korean people and other progressive peoples as a peerless patriot.
					
					 Another article titled "Choice of U.S." noted that the international community is getting increasingly vocal demanding the U.S. roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Myanmar newspaper The New Age on June 14 in an article titled "Realistic way of Korea's reunification" said it is a unanimous desire of not only the Korean people but also other peace-loving peoples in the world to put an end to the confrontation between the north and south of Korea and achieve national reunification.
					
					 It gave a detailed account of the reason why it becomes a realistic way of Korea's reunification for the north and the south to reject outsiders, firmly maintain the stand of By Our Nation Itself, stage a dynamic struggle for preserving nation's security and peace and create an atmosphere for improving the north-south relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Implement Inter-Korean Agreements
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Implement Inter-Korean Agreements
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted articles on its website on June 10 and 12 to mark the 16th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The article titled "Let us implement agreements common to nation" said that the three principles of national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration which the north and the south agreed upon and declared before the world are the great programmes for independent reunification and agreements common to the nation which should be invariably held fast to for improvement of the north-south relations and national reunification as they reflect the will and demand of the Korean nation and concrete situation of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Any agreement between the north and the south would be needless if the north-south agreements are reduced to dead papers with the change of the situation and the replacement of regime.
					
					 As history and reality clearly prove, the north-south relations will never get rid of catastrophe unless the south Korean authorities respect the north-south agreements and come out for implementing them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should face up to the aspiration of all the Koreans and demand of the times and come out as early as possible for implementing the agreements common to the nation after giving up anti-reunification attitude and stand.
					
					 Another article titled "National independence is the lifeline for national reunification movement" said that the principle of national independence stems from the intrinsic demand of the cause of Korea's reunification. It urged the south Korean authorities to drop pro-U.S. sycophancy make a bold decision to give up the humiliating policy of following the U.S. and stop disgraceful moves for cooperation with outsiders that hurt the fellow countrymen in the north.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Urge UN Not to Take Unjust Stand to DPRK
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Urge UN Not to Take Unjust Stand to DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Swiss preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on June 16 in support of a letter to the UN Secretariat sent by the participants in the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 The statement said that the letter clarified the firm will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to pave a new avenue to improving the inter-Korean relations and settling the issue of national reunification in response to Marshal Kim Jong Un's line and policies for national reunification.
					
					 It noted that the UN responsible for Korea's division 70-odd years ago has a due historical and moral obligation not to turn away the issue of Korea's reunification. 
					
					 It said the UN abused its name to hurl multi-national forces into the war of aggression ignited by the U.S. against the DPRK and the Korean people in 1950. it went on:
					
					 The UN should stop approaching the DPRK, a legitimate sovereign state and full-fledged UN member nation, from unjust stand at the wire-pulling of the U.S.
					
					 It is also obliged to positively support the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty and the Korean people's movement for reunification.
					
					 Officials of the UN Secretariat, especially the UN general secretary, should stop playing to the tune of the U.S. and preserve impartiality in the work for peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The peace-loving people all over the world support the letter.
					
					 The UN, not patronize the U.S.!
					
					 The UN, not take unjust stand to the DPRK!

articles.title: Chinese Newspaper Introduces 200-Day Campaign
articles.content:
Chinese Newspaper Introduces 200-Day Campaign
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Chinese newspaper International Herald Leader recently carried an article of its correspondent in Pyongyang under the title "Are you a Mallima rider?".
					 The newspaper said that a joint conference of officials of the party, state, economic and armed forces organs of the DPRK was held to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, at which the 200-day campaign was declared to make a breakthrough in the struggle for accomplishing the five-year strategy for the state economic development. It went on:
					
					 The fierce flames of the campaign for creating the Mallima speed are flaring up in the DPRK where the 200-day campaign of loyalty is being launched.
					
					 The slogan "Are you a Mallima rider?" appeals to all the service personnel and other people to achieve bigger successes in a shorter period in the spirit of running ten thousand-ri in a day and thus demonstrate the invincible might of the DPRK and step up the building of a socialist power.
					
					 The 200-day campaign is aimed at thoroughly accomplishing the five-year strategy for the state economic development advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 In Pyongyang City many soldiers and citizens are sweating day and night.
					
					 Such inspiring songs as "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" and "Let's Not Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though One May Die" are revving up the climate of single-minded unity.
					
					 Such slogans as "200-Day Campaign of Loyalty" and "Let Us All Become Honorable Victors in the 200-Day Campaign" are pasted in Pyongyang.
					
					 Letters "Are You a Mallima Rider?" and "Self-Development-First Principle" are written on not a few posters and slogans.
					
					 The self-development-first principle is surely of great significance for standing up to the international sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 The campaign has already been launched and the construction work is underway across the country.
					
					 Thanks to this vigorous and single-minded campaign, new buildings will be erected in Pyongyang, thus changing its look more beautifully.

articles.title: Enviado especial de presidente namibio rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Enviado especial de presidente namibio rinde homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El enviado especial del presidente de la Republica de Namibia y su comitiva rindieron homenaje el dia 24 al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il tras depositar ramo de flores ante sus estatuas de bronce erguidas en la capitalina colina Mansu.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza comunicacion de CS de ONU
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza comunicacion de CS de ONU
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada el dia 24 en relacion con que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU cuestiono el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					En medio de que conmueve al mundo la noticia del lanzamiento exitoso de prueba de cohete balistico estrategico tierra-tierra "Hwasong-10" que demostro sin reservas el poderio de defensa nacional de la Corea del Juche, aparecen las conductas injustas destinadas a cuestionar el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas autodefensivas de defensa nacional de la RPDC.
					
					El pasado dia 23, en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU fue publicada una comunicacion que habla de "condena" y de ejecucion de la "resolucion de sancion" acusando el lanzamiento de cohete de la RPDC.
					
					Rechazamos totalmente este documento, carente de la imparcialidad y aplicacion de la pauta de doble rasero, que no pasa de ser una invencion de EE.UU., fautor principal de la agravacion de la tension de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El lanzamiento exitoso de "Hwasong-10" es la labor normal realizada segun la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, siendo una medida autodefensiva para garantizar con firmeza la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo desde la amenaza permanente de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Pero, el CS de la ONU publico una comunicacion y hablo de la ejecucion de la "resolucion de la sancion" anti-RPDC, lo que es una conducta injusta que convierte lo blanco en lo negro.
					
					La misma "resolucion de la sancion" contra la RPDC es el producto de coaccion que viola flagrantemente la soberania del Estado soberano. 
					
					Tampoco el Secretariado de la ONU explica la base legal de esa "resolucion".
					
					De veras, EE.UU. es el autor que amenaza militarmente la RPDC y llevar intencionalmente a la tension la situacion enviando al Sur de Corea los bienes estrategicos como el submarino nuclear y los bombarderos estrategicos.
					
					Dado que EE.UU. amenaza permanentemente nuestra soberania y derecho a vivir, resultan justas y autodefensivas nuestras medidas para disponernos de los poderosos medios de ataque a fin de hacer frente a ello.
					
					Como ya hemos declarado, no pueden ser solo los esfuerzos unilaterales de alguien el alivio de la tension y la defensa de la estabilidad en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Seria mejor que antes de censurar nuestro fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militares EE.UU. reflexionara en su extrema politica hostil a la RPDC tras pensar en las razones por las que hemos sido convertida en el pais poseedor de arma nuclear y fortalecimos sin cesar el disuasivo de guerra.
					
					Debido a que perduran la equivocacion estrategica e imprudencia de EE.UU., la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana sigue pasando ahora a la extrema etapa incontrolable.
					
					Mientras que se perpetran invariablemente la amenaza nuclear y las maniobras de sancion y opresion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC, se tomaran de modo continuo las contramedidas autodefensivas a nuestro estilo al respecto.

articles.title: Director de EE.UU. de MINREX de RPDC se entrevista con AP
articles.content:
Director de EE.UU. de MINREX de RPDC se entrevista con AP
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- El director de Estados Unidos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sostuvo el dia 24 un interviu con el director de la sucursal de la agencia norteamericana AP en Pyongyang, de visita en la RPDC, en relacion con la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y el problema de relaciones entre la RPDC y EE.UU.
					Al responder a las preguntas relacionadas con la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, el director coreano condeno severamente a EE.UU. que en estos dias perpetra los ejercicios de golpe nuclear preventivo contra la RPDC y agrava al maximo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, enviando uno tras otro al Sur de Corea los bienes estrategicos como el submarino nuclear Mississippi y la escuadrilla de cazabombarderos B-52H.
					
					Expuso la posicion de principios de la RPDC de que se ve obligada a seguir tomando las medidas autodefensivas para fortalecer el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo, como la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misiles para hacer frente a la recrudescente amenaza de agresion de EE.UU. y las fuerzas lacayunas.
					
					Al referirse al lanzamiento de prueba de "Hwasong-10", cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance tierra-tierra, el aclaro la posicion de la RPDC segun la cual a fin de garantizar con firmeza la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo desde las persistentes amenazas de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles, tambien nosotros debemos poseer los poderosos medios de ataque que pueden amenazar constantemente a los enemigos. 
					
					En cuanto al tema de la mejora de relaciones con Estados Unidos, se refirio a que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un senalo en el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea que Estados Unidos debe apreciar correctamente la posicion estrategica de nuestra RPDC como potencia nuclear y la tendencia actual, abandonar su anacronica politica hostil contra la RPDC, cambiar el acuerdo de armisticio por el de paz y retirar de Corea del Sur sus tropas agresoras y armamentos. 
					
					Al finalizar, el volvio a aclarar la posicion de la RPDC de mejorar y normalizar las relaciones con los paises que respetan la soberania de nuestro pais y nos tratan amistosamente aunque en el pasado tuvieron las relaciones hostiles con nuestro pais.

articles.title: CRPP subraya que Park Geun-hye no puede eludir responsabilidad de quiebra de acuerdos N-S
articles.content:
CRPP subraya que Park Geun-hye no puede eludir responsabilidad de quiebra de acuerdos N-S 
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que recientemente la banda titere surcoreana disparateo que la posesion de armas nucleares de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea significa la ruptura del acuerdo intercoreano, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) respondio el dia 24 a la ACNC como sigue:
					Hace poco, los compinches del Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea senalaron en el llamado "dato sobre la posicion con respecto a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio" que las armas nucleares del Norte (de Corea) rompen el espiritu principal del acuerdo intercoreano e impiden el mejoramiento de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Sumandose a tal sofisma, los medios conservadores de prensa y los "especialistas en los asuntos del Norte" dicen que se interrumpieron el dialogo, el intercambio y la cooperacion entre ambas partes coreanas debido a la prueba nuclear de la RPDC y su lanzamiento de cohete balistico. 
					
					La presente chismografia deviene una artimana descarada para justificar su politica conflictiva anti-RPDC al imputar a esta la responsabilidad de haber llevado a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas y una burla intolerable al espiritu principal del acuerdo intercoreano. 
					
					La invalidacion del espiritu principal del acuerdo N-S y la actual coyuntura de las relaciones intercoreanas no se deben al disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo ni al cohete balistico de la RPDC sino a los compinches de Park Geun-hye que cometen actos vendepatrias sonando con aislar y aplastar a la parte connacional con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Sin embargo, partiendo de la logica de bandido, la banda titere surcoreana habla descaradamente del espiritu principal del acuerdo intercoreano y acusa a la RPDC de la supuesta "quiebra" y "violacion".
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, los titeres surcoreanos perdieron el derecho a hablar del acuerdo N-S porque convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en la base avanzada nuclear mas grande del mundo e imponen asi a la nacion el desastre nuclear.
					
					Ellos no podran eludir nunca la responsabilidad de haber negado y quebrado los acuerdos intercoreanos, y seran condenados severamente por la historia y la nacion.

articles.title: Embajador australiano expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
articles.content:
Embajador australiano expone voluntad de desarrollar relaciones de amistad con RPDC
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ACNC) -- William Paterson, embajador de la Federacion Australiana acreditado en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y su comitiva se reunieron desde el dia 20 hasta el 24 con Choe Hui Chol, director general encargado de Asia y Oceania, Ma Tong Hui, jefe del Instituto de Desarme y Paz, y otros funcionarios correspondientes del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC. 
					En la ocasion, la parte coreana informo detalladamente a la parte australiana la posicion de principios del gobierno de la RPDC de ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad con la Federacion Australiana en varios dominios como la politica, la economia y la cultura sin hacer caso del cambio de situaciones bajo el ideal de la politica exterior de la independencia, la paz y la amistad, y las otras sobre el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					La parte australiana aviso de manera sincera y franca sus criterios sobre el problema de la Peninsula Coreana y otros problemas regionales y de interes mutuo, reafirmo que en el futuro tambien reconocera la RPDC como un Estado soberano y no la hostilizara, y atendio a la posicion de la parte coreana de que la politica hostil de EE.UU. a la RPDC obstaculiza gravemente la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ambas partes discutieron sinceramente en un ambiente lleno de amistad el medio para desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre la RPDC y la FA.
					
					El embajador y su comitiva recorrieron varios objetivos de cooperacion incluyendo el acueducto por gravedad de la zona de la cabeza del distrito de Tongrim de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, que se construyo con el fondo ofrecido por el gobierno australiano a traves de las organizaciones internacionales.
